channel.title: Custom Admin Cape (Doesn't make you go invisi!)
channel.description:
I made this cape because the client that I'm using had a pretty cool admin cape that looks like a kind of skillcape that came with it. However this cape mixed with any even slightly high poly model would make you go invisible, therefore I made this custom cape, which still looks pretty cool, but doesn't make you go invisible (low polygon count) And so if you guyz want to use it aswell I'll release it with the ints to go with it! (Don't flame me about it being some nooby recolour, the crown took quite a while to make ... and it took some time on top of that getting the rotations right and the colour scheme sorta matching the crown. I also had to resize the template I used so it actually went well with the character's body.
Thanks to runescape for the skillcape template.
Wireframe: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/e80138.jpg[/img] In the Client: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/vpgnz7.jpg[/img] Zoomed in: (Makes it a bit blurry, it's clearer ingame) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/14kutmf.jpg[/img]
So here's the link to the models and ints - enjoy http://rapidshare.com/files/363590504/Admin_Cape_Files.rar.html

item.title: Custom Admin Cape (Doesn't make you go invisi!)
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

You do realize that saying you ‘made’ the cape is claiming its yours and therefore violates the rules: The origional creator mustbe credited. In otherwords, if Jagex isnt credited atleast 95%, then this will be locked.
